name: Magink
description:
A 2D puzzle platformer where you take on the role of Arcane  Eric. Arcane Eric uses his drawing magic to shield himself from enemies and create platforms to traverse the kingdom of Blek! Eric is on a quest to save the kingdom from the Evil Wizard Council. 

Join Eric on his quest and try Magink!

The Creators

  • Andri Karel Júlíusson

  • Axel Björnsson

  • Darri Valgarðsson

  • Smári Björn Gunnarsson
